      • generateNumbers

        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> generateNumbers()
        Creates an array list of randomly generated numbers for the user to guess, The numbers are in a certain order and not repeated.
        Returns:
        a list array of the numbers to guess

        Returns:

      • singleRound

        void singleRound​(Game game,
                 int guess)
        Does one round of the game, will compare the answer and the user's guess. then will return the result, exact match and partial match
        Parameters:
        game - the game object of current game
        guess - the user's guess

      • checkGameEnd

        GameProgress checkGameEnd​(Game game)
        Checks to see if the game has ended, whether the user guessed correctly or ran out of guesses
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        whether the game has ended
